page.title: 15Apley Park
page.content: The Apley Park estate is the newest {housing development}in the area.It is a mixture of detached houses and bungalows.Around the estate are lots of small lanes;one that goes from the estate to Leegomery used to be a road.Nearby is the Blessed Robert Johnson Catholic secondary{school which is the only one in the county.Next to the school is a{camp for displaced persons;it was used to house people who had fled from Eastern Europe during the Second World War.A new{road}has been built to replace the old Whitchurch Road.It goes past the new Telford hospital.At the top of the road is an old building which was the {lodge}house for Apley Castle.
